roleset.name: aware, knowing
roleset.note: COGNIZANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, recognize.02; nominal 'cognition' based on BOLT-7. (from cognizant.01-j)
COGNITION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from cognition.01-n)

example.name: cognizant-j: both args
example.text: I expected it after the election , but I guess the GOP vipers are cognizant of their fate and are quickly lining up behind their next late , great " savior " .

example.name: cognition-n
example.text: so as long as there is a likeness without causality among the angels, each will retain his cognition of the others.
